title: New Digital Edition—Theatrum Artis Scribendi
content:
I have recently come into possession one of the 300 facsimiles of Jodocus Hondius’s _Theatrum Artis Scribendi_, a very rare book of European handwriting specimens. Seeing as how even the facsimile editions are hard to come by, I decided to photograph all of the original pages and put it online. Following are a few samples; the entire thing can be downloaded from [http://www.jpad.biz/pdfs/tas.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20110914080419/http:/www.dunwichtype.com/pdfs/tas.pdf).
